# Adenza

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="768" height="480" type="adenza" layout="responsive" data-block-id="614f579bdd5b213cd8bdae26">
```

## Configuration

For more information, please [see FAQ](https://adenza.network/faq).

Required parameters:

-   width
-   height
-   type
-   layout
-   data-block-id
